width=”1/1″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” bg_image_animation=”none” border_type=”simple” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid”][vc_column_text]Headquartered in Dubai, UAE, Alutech Aluminium And Glass has engineered over five hundred world-class building façades over the past five decades. These include one of the world’s most luxurious hotels (The Burj Al Arab), one of the world’s largest airports (The Dubai International Airport) and the world’s tallest tower (The Burj Khalifa). Our ability to deliver such large-scale projects on time and within budget stem from the scale of our capability, housed within many regional production facilities for Aluminium, Architectural Glass, Steel & Stainless Steel and Metal Cladding.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner column_margin=”default” column_direction=”default” column_direction_tablet=”default” column_direction_phone=”default” text_align=”left”][vc_column_inner column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_tablet=”inherit” column_padding_phone=”inherit” column_padding_position=”all” column_element_spacing=”default” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” column_link_target=”_self” gradient_direction=”left_to_right” overlay_strength=”0.3″ width=”1/3″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” bg_image_animation=”none” border_type=”simple” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid”][divider line_type=”Small Line” line_alignment=”default” line_thickness=”7″ divider_color=”accent-color” custom_height=”10″ custom_line_width=”50″][vc_column_text]

column_border_style=”solid”][vc_column_text]Alutech Aluminium And Glass established a regional office in Muscat, Oman upon being awarded their flagship project in the region: Muscat International Airport. Through the process of designing, supplying and installing a complete suite of external and internal glazing works, our base of operations was critical to the timely delivery of the new terminal. Following this prestigious project, our Muscat office has continued to secure and support several projects across Oman.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner column_margin=”default” column_direction=”default” column_direction_tablet=”default” column_direction_phone=”default” text_align=”left”][vc_column_inner column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_tablet=”inherit” column_padding_phone=”inherit” column_padding_position=”all” column_element_spacing=”default” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” column_link_target=”_self” gradient_direction=”left_to_right” overlay_strength=”0.3″ width=”1/3″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” bg_image_animation=”none” border_type=”simple” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid”][divider line_type=”Small Line” line_alignment=”default” line_thickness=”7″ divider_color=”accent-color” custom_height=”10″ custom_line_width=”50″][vc_column_text]

width=”1/1″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” bg_image_animation=”none” border_type=”simple” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid”][vc_column_text]Alutech Aluminium And Glass North America utilises a full range of design, engineering and manufacturing services for the most advanced curtain wall and façade solutions in the world by the Headquarters. It also offers access to the Alutech Aluminium And Glass’s coating, architectural glass and stainless-steel offerings, through our partner agency in New York. This office allows for the Alutech Aluminium And Glass to deliver high quality, innovative products and services throughout the Americas including the United States, Canada and Mexico.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner column_margin=”default” column_direction=”default” column_direction_tablet=”default” column_direction_phone=”default” text_align=”left”][vc_column_inner column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_tablet=”inherit” column_padding_phone=”inherit” column_padding_position=”all” column_element_spacing=”default” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” column_link_target=”_self” gradient_direction=”left_to_right” overlay_strength=”0.3″ width=”1/3″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” bg_image_animation=”none” border_type=”simple” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid”][divider line_type=”Small Line” line_alignment=”default” line_thickness=”7″ divider_color=”accent-color” custom_line_width=”50″ custom_height=”10″][vc_column_text]
